org.apache.hivemind.service.impl
Class LoggingUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hivemind.service.impl.LoggingUtils

public class LoggingUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Collection of static methods used by loggers to log method entry and exit.

Author:
Howard Lewis Ship
